## DisplayType interface

How this facet should be displayed on the chart

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface DisplayType 
```

## Properties

<table><thead><tr><th>

Property


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[maxDisplayed?](./paramanifest.displaytype.maxdisplayed.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The highest value label displayed on this axis of the chart. Defaults to the maximum value of any series relative to this axis.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[minDisplayed?](./paramanifest.displaytype.mindisplayed.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The lowest value displayed on this axis of the chart. Defaults to zero for the dependent axis and the minimum independent value of any series for the independent axis.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[orientation?](./paramanifest.displaytype.orientation.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

"horizontal" \| "vertical"


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ What type of chart element represents the facet.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[type](./paramanifest.displaytype.type.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

"axis" \| "marking" \| "area" \| "angle"


</td><td>

What type of chart element represents the facet.


</td></tr>
